channel.title: Pures?
channel.description:
Does anyone have any tips or training methods for a F2p pure.
I'm looking for these kind of stats. 40 attack 60-80 strength 1 defence 60-80 range 60+ magic 44-45 prayer any hp level.
just need some tips on where to train, etc. and maybe some money making guides.

item.title: Pures?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:9, topic:340565”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=436933.msg3216351#msg3216351 date=1274712822]

It’s not really a pure if you have strength AND magic AND range…

Well actually, you can have 40 80 1 with 80 range and magic and be perfectly balanced. With 1 prayer, this is quite a good character.
Of course, such a character is outclassed by its 99 strength counterparts.

I find that 1 defense is annoying, constant eating. Wasn’t 70 50 70 great? Cant remember why though.
[/quote]
Back in the day when stakers were less savvy (and virtually always expected to be fighting another 1 defence pure), these accounts would have torags in their inventory and a whip. The fight wouldn’t have armour turned off, and when it started the 70 def account would throw on the armour and proceed to give the pure a beat down.
They were no good for anything outside of staking. Now that names are impossible to obscure and staking is dead, the accounts have no real purpose.[/quote]

Good ol O0o0o0oo0o0o0o’s

Read full topic

item.title: Pures?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

also on rsc pal!

high defence attack and low str won all duels

my 99 att 97 def 56 str won most fights

Read full topic

item.title: Pures?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:7, topic:340565”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=436933.msg3216259#msg3216259 date=1274699539]

It’s not really a pure if you have strength AND magic AND range…

Well actually, you can have 40 80 1 with 80 range and magic and be perfectly balanced. With 1 prayer, this is quite a good character.
Of course, such a character is outclassed by its 99 strength counterparts.
[/quote]
I find that 1 defense is annoying, constant eating. Wasn’t 70 50 70 great? Cant remember why though.[/quote]
Back in the day when stakers were less savvy (and virtually always expected to be fighting another 1 defence pure), these accounts would have torags in their inventory and a whip. The fight wouldn’t have armour turned off, and when it started the 70 def account would throw on the armour and proceed to give the pure a beat down.
They were no good for anything outside of staking. Now that names are impossible to obscure and staking is dead, the accounts have no real purpose.

Read full topic

gl getting 45 prayer.

item.title: Pures?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Get to 40 atk & str using goblins or spiders or w/e. Then spend the rest of your time training str on Alkharid warriors (I got 80 str there).

As for range, there’s a nice script on kbot.info where you can train at the lumbridge swamps on a safespot against skeletons.

Use superheat item for most of your mage on steel bars and you’ll be done in no time without cost.

gl getting 45 prayer.

Read full topic
